rate jala sampathata wagakiyana thani aayathanayak nomathiwima jala kalamanakaranayedi barapathala gataluwak bawata pathwa athi bawa janadhipathithuma pawasayi.bhauthika washayen ape bhumiyata labena jala pa්ramanaya, ape rata men dasa gunayaka bhumiyakata pa්ramanawath wuwada eya nisi kalamanakaranayakata lak nowima hethuwen jala gataluwalata muhunadimata siduwa thibena bawa da janadhipathithuma pa්rakasha kaleya.janadhipathi garu maithi්rapala sirisena mathithuma me bawa pa්rakasha kale ada (23) paswaruwe kolambaa sugathadasa gruhastha ki්radanganaye pawathi ‘supan pa්raja abhimani sansada samuluwa’ amathamini.
